body:
> @SanmuWangZJU
> Your PR told me you are veteran, welcome to play a valuable role in ShardingSphere community. 😉

Thanks, hope more of my ideas benefit the community.

Hi community,

Currently, we need more volunteers to take charge of the first and third ones. If you would like to translate some of our materials to English or organize blogs concerning ShardingSphere, please respond to this issue. 

Welcome! 😀
FYI: https://shardingsphere.apache.org/document/current/en/quick-start/sharding-proxy-quick-start/

> A better variable name for users. 
> 
> BTY, do you think `getPartitionRangeMap()` is time-consuming? If so, there is [a good idea](https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/pull/5363/files#diff-2194e93614984507fecf4f07962a5beaR139) for reference.

Thank you, I will refer to this PR to improve the performance of RangeShardingAlgorithm.😃

1. config and start sharding-proxy like above link
2. use jdbc connecting to sharding-proxy just as a real mysql server

> 1. config and start sharding-proxy like above link
> 2. use jdbc connecting to sharding-proxy just as a real mysql server

I have almost followed the steps you mentioned, but there is the following error

this is mysql application.yaml
```
spring:
  datasource:
    dynamic:
      primary: master
      datasource:
        master:
          username: ${aic.datasource.username}
          password: ${aic.datasource.password}
          url: jdbc:mysql://192.168.1.211:3312/cloud-master?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf8&autoReconnect=true&useSSL=false&serverTimezone=GMT%2B8
          driver-class-name: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
```
Proxy in 3312 is launched successfully?

you can try it with mysql command first:
> mysql -h192.168.1.211 -P3312 -uroot -ppassword

> you can try it with mysql command first:
> 
> > mysql -h192.168.1.211 -P3312 -uroot -ppassword

Yes, he did, but the springboot didn't work. I had no problem connecting with navicat
I have create a issue #5377 for that, it is better to summary the disabled and enable cases in the form of report.
